uk.ac.ox.krr.logmap2.lexicon

Class LexicalUtilitiesStatic

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ox.krr.logmap2.lexicon.LexicalUtilitiesStatic

  • public class LexicalUtilitiesStatic
extends java.lang.Object
    Static Variant not recommended for web server where there may be multiple concurrent request Manages the lexical variants provided by WordNet, UMLSLexicon, Stemmers and number normalization
    Author:
    Ernesto Jimenez-Ruiz Created: Sep 11, 2011
